New Records: Nicholas Pooran surpassed Chris Gayle to become the leading six-hitter for West Indies in T20Is.
West Indies scored their highest total in a men's T20 World Cup match.
Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran hit a blistering 98, including a world record 36-run over against Azmatullah Omarzai.
Obed McCoy took a three-wicket haul, denting Afghanistan's progress in the chase.
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies finished the group stage with a perfect record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The result had little bearing on the Super Eight seedings as both teams had already cemented their spots.
Others: The match was played at Gros Islet, June 17, 2024, in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
